problem: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,P、Q分别是AD、AC的中点,如果PQ=3,那么菱形ABCD的周长是()
answer: 解:由题意可知,PQ是△ADC的中位线,则DC=2PQ=2×3=6,那么菱形ABCD的周长=6×4=24,故选C．
comment: 本题考查了三角形中位线的性质,菱形四边相等的性质．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in the diamond ABCD, P and Q are the midpoints of AD and AC respectively. If PQ = N_0, then the perimeter of the diamond ABCD is ()
